features: Cooling Support Queen Pillows 2 Pack:Are you searching of a bed pillows for sleeping that offers both excellent support and comfortable fit, while also being durable? If the ability to fine-tune its softness or firmness by adjusting its fill material, alongside a cooling, soft and yet breathable fabric would be more compatible with your select？then our queen size memory foam pillows may be an ideal choice for you.

Shredded Memory Foam Pillows:We use high-resilience memory foam as filling material for our pillow, with its excellent support and durability that prevents any collapse or deformation over long-term use. Our unique shredded memory foam technique blends ultra-fine fibers, providing not only long-lasting support but also fluffiness that enhances the comfortable feel around your head and neck.

Cool Pillows for Sleeping That Stay Cold:Our pillow uses two fabric types with different tactile experiences, making it versatile for year-round use, and fabric is removable and washable. Side A uses ice silk technology that gives a cooling surface, that's ideal for spring and summer use, The ice silk fabric is especially ideal for 'hot sleepers.' Side B has an soft, and breathable texture that provides warmth and comfort during autumn and winter. Both fabrics fulfill different sleep needs.

Adjustable Support Pillow:Our pillow is suitable for the sleep needs of most individuals. Once you lay on our pillow, the shredded memory foam will adapt to your head and neck curve, effectively distributing pressure. If you find the pillow too firm or high, you can easily adjust the amount of filling to reach your preferred level of support. This feature enables our pillow to accommodate all types of sleeping positions, including back, side, and stomach sleepers.

Use/After-Sales:The pillow is packaged in a vacuum compression bag, with dimensions of 20 * 30 inches. After unpacking, it can restore its original plumpness after being laid flat for about 3 hours.if you have any questions or dissatisfaction, please feel free to contact us. We will respond within 24 hours to provide you with a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillows! VERY firm!
reviews.reviewText: I have recently updated our bedding to all white and wanted to replace my husbands standard memory foam pillows to king size. After searching and researching, I found these pillows and boy am I glad I did! When they arrived in the air tight plastic, I was worried they wouldn't fluff up. As soon as I opened the packaging, they expanded immediately! They came in very soft zipper protectors and the cool side did feel cooler to the touch than the other side. There wasn't any weird smells that I noticed. I let them sit for hours to give them time to expand completely. I sprayed them with some Lysol as I do all of our pillows. Since I'm doing all white with our bedding, I wanted them bright white and added my own protectors and cases. So each side being labeled would be impossible to see. They are VERY FIRM!!!My husband has been using them for a full week now and he speaks daily about how much he loves them! :) He is a back sleeper and the way they elevate helps him breathe better. In my opinion, if you are a smaller person and a side sleeper as I am, these pillows will require you to take some of the foam out to modify them or at least you have the option to do so! Besides feeling very rested in the morning, if you really want to know how well you've slept, look at your bedding! Since he's been using these pillows, it looks like he doesn't move all night and in the morning he could just pull the covers up to make the bed. lol! I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed and love these pillows they do stay cool, if you flip them over regular temp. Very sturdy but flexible , my husband loves them as well and we sleep soundly with them! Also, they are heavy when you take them out of the box and unpack them let them sit out and they will plump up since they are compressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can remove filling to adjust for comfort.
reviews.reviewText: Great pillows. Zippered cover and zippered opening to remove filling an adjust for your comfort. I bought two. I had another zippered pillow case around so I made another pillow. Pillow stay cool too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed new pillows and wanted to get away from white as they just look dingey sometimes so fast. I am pleased with the support these pillows offer. They are different, I have never had a cut foam pillow but they are nice, and I have always been a two pillow sleeper, which I can not do with these. They are full and kind of firm (in a good way). They do need fluffed a little every couple nights or they get smushed down funny. Pleased with the quality and price point for two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought 4 for my dad and brother
reviews.reviewText: 8 Pillows in total. Took maybe less than half hour for them to fully air up. So far the pillows feel soft than they look. Might buy myself a set soon. My brother and dad seem to enjoy the new pillows I bought them. Since they can be refilled, I truly enjoyed that. Gonna need to buy myself a set soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh man, we love these!
reviews.reviewText: I have struck out before when ordering pillows online but these are amazing. Comfortable and cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These only took a few minutes to get back to their original shape but once I started using them I realized they are overstuffed and they do not let my lean my head down if you’re used to resting your chin on your pillow while you do homework on your laptop this isn’t for you it’s very uncomfortable it hurts your neck and it feels like you’re fighting with the pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow ever
reviews.reviewText: Oh my gosh! This is like build a pillow. You can make it however, you want it. I don’t like to puffy of a pillow. The shredded foam comes in a case with a zipper. That case is inside the cool/ warm pillow cover with a zipper. It’s a beautiful cover. I then put an additional pillow cover, that I can repeatedly wash,over that before I put on the actual pillow case on. You can go in and take out as much foam as you like. Make sure to rearrange the foam evenly and to the corners. It has a faint smell from the machine that cuts the foam. If you air out when you get it, it will be fine. Or I took a handful of dusting powder, and put my hand inside and release the powder into the foam everywhere. I built the pillow to the exact size that I wanted!
